meanings.sent1: The plane had a flapless design for faster speed.
meanings.sent2: The flapless wings of the bird allowed it to glide effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was flapless, making it more aerodynamic.
meanings.sent4: Her flapless dress flowed elegantly in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The flapless kite soared gracefully in the sky.

meanings.sent1: The toy car was flapless, so it couldn't change direction easily.
meanings.sent2: The flapless box was difficult to open without tearing.
meanings.sent3: The flapless umbrella turned inside out in the strong wind.
meanings.sent4: His flapless wallet couldn't hold all his cards securely.
meanings.sent5: The flapless boat struggled to navigate through the rough waters.

meanings.sent1: The flapless jacket was sleek and modern in design.
meanings.sent2: The flapless envelope was used for important documents.
meanings.sent3: The flapless glove felt strange without the usual buttons.
meanings.sent4: The flapless book cover had a minimalist look.
meanings.sent5: The flapless flag fluttered proudly in the breeze.
